item.title: 道达尔首席执行官称油价低估了俄罗斯制裁的影响
item.description: 欧洲最大炼油商的老板说，石油市场低估了最新一轮对俄制裁的影响，制裁已开始影响石油的流动。【原文：Oil markets are underestimating the impact of the latest round of sanctions on Russia, which are starting to affect flows, the boss of Europe’s largest refiner said.】

item.title: 信实公司与谷歌签订协议，为 Jio 提供为期 18 个月的免费双子座人工智能服务
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）宣布与谷歌（Google）达成一项协议，将为其电信部门的用户提供 18 个月的免费使用谷歌人工智能专业平台的机会，这家由穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的企业集团正努力吸引世界上人口最多的国家的更多用户。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. announced a pact with Google that will provide its telecom unit’s subscribers with 18 months of free access to Google’s AI pro platform, as the Mukesh Ambani-led conglomerate seeks to lure more users in the world’s most populous nation.】

item.title: 前麦肯锡顾问正在训练人工智能模型来取代他们
item.description: 近年来，从英国、中国到沙特阿拉伯和澳大利亚等主要市场，咨询业都受到了逆风的冲击。但最近的挑战可能来自内部。【原文：The consulting sector has been buffeted by headwinds in key markets from the UK and China to Saudi Arabia and Australia in recent years. But its latest challenge might come from within.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦与埃克森公司就卡沙干油田扩建举行会谈
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士表示，哈萨克斯坦正在与埃克森美孚公司就开采卡沙干巨型油田的未开发部分进行谈判。【原文：Kazakhstan is in talks with Exxon Mobil Corp. about tapping the undeveloped part of the giant Kashagan oil field, said people familiar the matter.】

item.title: 三种情况可能破坏黄金的辉煌走势
item.description:
金属从创纪录水平回落并不是故事的结局，但它凸显了与美联储独立性和各国央行购买更多金银的意愿相关的风险。【原文：

The metal’s pullback from a record isn’t the end of the story, but it highlights risks tied to Fed independence and central banks’ appetite to buy more bullion.

item.title: 墨西哥经济萎缩重燃衰退担忧
item.description: 墨西哥第三季度经济小幅萎缩，表明总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）在与美国贸易紧张局势一触即发的情况下刺激经济增长的计划正在落空，重新引发了人们对今年经济衰退的担忧。【原文：Mexico’s economy contracted slightly in the third quarter, a sign that President Claudia Sheinbaum’s plans to stimulate growth despite simmering trade tensions with the US are falling short, reigniting concern of a recession this year.】

item.title: 销售放缓，中国万科亏损 23 亿美元
item.description: 中国万科集团第三季度亏损加剧，凸显了房地产市场长期低迷继续拖累其销售所带来的日益严峻的挑战。【原文：China Vanke Co. reported a deeper third-quarter loss, highlighting mounting challenges as the prolonged property market downturn continues to weigh on its sales.】

item.title: 新兴市场货币下跌，谨慎的美联储提振美元
item.description: 由于美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的谨慎基调帮助支撑了美元，并抑制了对风险资产的偏好，新兴市场货币承压。【原文：Emerging-market currencies were under pressure as a cautious tone from US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell helped prop up the dollar and damped appetite for riskier assets.】

item.title: 诺瓦泰克首席执行官称欧盟禁令后俄罗斯液化天然气将找到新市场
item.description: 诺瓦泰克股份公司（Novatek PJSC）首席执行官、亿万富翁列昂尼德-米赫尔松（Leonid Mikhelson）说，在欧盟从 2027 年起禁止进口液化天然气后，俄罗斯的液化天然气将找到其他市场。【原文：Russia’s liquefied natural gas will find other markets after the European Union bans imports from 2027, said Leonid Mikhelson, the billionaire chief executive officer at Novatek PJSC.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯将于明年更新外资持股限额
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯市场监管机构表示，明年将决定放宽外资在该国股票中的投资限制。【原文：Saudi Arabia will decide on relaxing foreign-investment limits in the country’s stocks by next year, the market regulator said.】

item.title: Meta Platforms 在人工智能消费热潮中启动巨型债券销售
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司已开始营销多达六个部分的美元债券销售，在人工智能支出激增的背景下筹集现金。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has begun marketing a dollar-bond sale in as many as six parts, raising cash amid surging growth of artificial intelligence spending.】

item.title: 美国国会向特朗普发出关税冲击美国经济的信息
item.description: 随着特朗普本周在亚洲各地提高关税，美国国会对美国小企业遭受的打击表示担忧【原文：As Trump raises tariffs across Asia this week, Congress has been voicing its concern about the hit to US small businesses】

item.title: 三款热门游戏使 Roblox 预订量和用户数超出预期
item.description: Roblox 公司公布了其有史以来业绩最好的一个季度的报告，在三款热门游戏的推动下，该公司的日活跃用户数超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Roblox Corp. reported its best quarter ever with daily active users beating analysts’ expectations on the heels of three hit games.】

item.title: 美联储推动美元走强，印度卢比逼近历史新低
item.description: 由于交易商减少了对美联储 12 月降息的押注，而且当地央行也未出手支持印度卢比，印度卢比受到美元走强的打压，逼近历史最低点。【原文：The Indian rupee approached a record low, pressured by a stronger US dollar as traders pared bets on a December rate cut by the Federal Reserve, and as the local central bank was not seen stepping in to support the currency.】

item.title: 贝森特称中国今年将购买 1,200 万吨大豆
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，中国已同意在今年购买 1200 万公吨大豆，这为焦急等待恢复对这个亚洲国家出口的美国农民提供了一些宽慰。【原文：China has agreed to buy 12 million metric tons of soybeans this year, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said, providing some relief to US farmers who have anxiously awaited the resumption of exports to the Asian nation.】

item.title: 比亚迪利润再次下滑，中国电动车巨头压力重重
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司（BYD Co., Ltd.）报告称，由于国内竞争加剧和行业审查对这家中国汽车制造商的销售前景造成压力，该公司的季度利润再次出现下滑。【原文：BYD Co. reported another slump in quarterly profit as intensifying domestic competition and industry scrutiny pile pressure on the Chinese carmaker’s sales outlook.】

item.title: 原油价格下跌导致中国石油第三季度利润下降
item.description: 由于国际原油价格下跌，中国石油天然气股份有限公司第三季度利润下降。【原文：PetroChina Co. posted a drop in third-quarter profit after international crude prices fell.】

item.title: 原糖跌幅扩大，创五年来最低水平
item.description: 由于越来越多的人预测全球供应过剩，纽约原糖期货跌至五年来的最低水平，加深了昨天盘中的跌势。【原文：Raw sugar futures in New York sank to their lowest level in five years, deepening yesterday’s intraday slide, amid mounting forecasts of a global supply glut.】

item.title: AIG 将以超过 27 亿美元的价格收购 Convex 和 Onex 的股份
item.description: 美国国际集团公司（American International Group Inc.【原文：American International Group Inc. struck deals to buy stakes in specialty insurer Convex Group and alternative-asset manager Onex Corp. in transactions that total more than $2.7 billion.】

item.title: 英国宽带挑战者 Netomnia 以 20 亿英镑出售 CityFibre 和 Nexfibre
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，英国光纤挑战者品牌 Netomnia Ltd. 正在为可能的 20 亿英镑（26 亿美元）出售计划寻求多个买家，并已与竞争对手 CityFibre Holdings Ltd. 进行了深入谈判。【原文：UK fiber challenger brand Netomnia Ltd. is courting multiple buyers for a potential £2 billion ($2.6 billion) sale, and has held advanced talks with rival CityFibre Holdings Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 扭亏压力增大，日产警告将亏损 18 亿美元
item.description: 日产汽车公司预计今年将出现 2,750 亿日元（约合 18 亿美元）的运营亏损，因为这家陷入困境的汽车制造商正在大力削减成本，以挽救其不断恶化的财务状况。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. expects a ¥275 billion ($1.8 billion) operating loss this year as the embattled carmaker pushes ahead with a cost-cutting spree to rescue its deteriorating financial position.】

item.title: 好时警告万圣节销售疲软，同时上调业绩展望
item.description: 好时公司（Hershey Co.）称美国万圣节销售额令人失望，但由于价格上涨，该公司仍上调了年度业绩展望。【原文：Hershey Co. called out disappointing Halloween sales so far in the US, but still upped its annual outlook thanks to price hikes.】

item.title: 特朗普结怨后二级市场对马斯克公司的胃口降温
item.description: 二级市场数据显示，在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发生争执后，投资者对他的私人公司投资组合失去了兴趣。【原文：Investors are losing appetite for Elon Musk’s portfolio of private companies, following the tycoon’s spat with President Donald Trump, according to secondary market data.】

item.title: Meta、微软在人工智能领域的投入开始动摇投资者信心
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，马特-戴总结了 Alphabet、微软和 Meta 公布的最新支出计划。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Matt Day sizes up the latest spending plans announced by Alphabet, Microsoft and Meta.】

item.title: 康卡斯特在密集促销周期中减缓互联网和电视业务亏损
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）在互联网价格锁定保证和捆绑计划的帮助下，减缓了第三季度宽带和有线电视用户流失的趋势。【原文：Comcast Corp. slowed the tide of broadband and cable TV customer defections in the third quarter with help from an internet price-lock guarantee and bundled plans.】

item.title: 美联储鹰派 "合唱团 "日益壮大凸显特朗普面临的挑战
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔并不急于再次降息。【原文：Jerome Powell is in no rush to cut interest rates again.】

item.title: 摩根大通欧洲顶级银行家预测明年将出现 "大并购
item.description: 摩根大通公司的一位高级银行家预测，欧洲大宗交易活动的激增，以及作为雄心勃勃的多元化努力一部分而在中东如雨后春笋般出现的新公司的业务，将在未来几年推动该公司在更广泛地区的业务。【原文：A top JPMorgan Chase & Co. banker predicted that a surge in big-ticket dealmaking activity in Europe and business from new companies mushrooming in the Middle East as part of ambitious diversification efforts will drive the firm’s business in the wider region in coming years.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称，数字欧元试点阶段最快将于 2027 年启动
item.description: 如果各国政府和欧洲议会明年就法律框架达成一致，欧洲中央银行可能会在 2027 年启动数字欧元的试点阶段。【原文：The European Central Bank may launch a pilot phase for the digital euro in 2027, provided national governments and the European Parliament agree on a legal framework next year.】

item.title: 富时罗素、StepStone 首次推出私人资产每日指数
item.description: StepStone Group Inc.和富时罗素（FTSE Russell）首次推出了一系列指数，这些指数将每日提供有关私募投资基金的数据，旨在为这个相对不透明的市场带来更多透明度。【原文：StepStone Group Inc. and FTSE Russell debuted a series of indexes that will churn out daily data on private investment funds, in an effort to bring more transparency to the relatively opaque market.】
